qas.question: What was the new method of linear programming that von Neumann suggested?
What did von Neuman's method use?
What was von Neumann's method known to be the first of?

answers.text: algorithm was the first interior point method of linear programming.

context: Later, von Neumann suggested a new method of linear programming, using the <a0_0>homogeneous linear system of Gordan<a0_0/> (1873), which was later popularized by Karmarkar's algorithm. Von Neumann's method used a <a1_0>pivoting algorithm between simplices<a1_0/>, with the pivoting decision determined by a nonnegative least squares subproblem with a convexity constraint (projecting the zero-vector onto the convex hull of the active simplex). Von Neumann's <a2_0>algorithm was the first interior point method of linear programming.
